description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Many fools have tried to survive the "Night Of Doom", only adding to our numbers. Have you got what it takes? 3d First person shooter, 3 Levels with different enemies all aiming for one thing... Your head!
